message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
I need to respond to 10 statements about AI in education as a primary or secondary school teacher from Cyprus. Let me think through each statement carefully and provide thoughtful responses:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - This is generally true. AI can assist in generating content, organizing ideas, and providing suggestions. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - This is possible through adaptive learning systems and personalized content. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - AI can help with personalized learning, tutoring assistance, and individual feedback. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs - AI can provide multilingual support, accessibility features, and differentiated content for students with special needs. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - This is clearly true. AI can help with grading, attendance, scheduling, etc. I would say "Strongly agree"

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - This is a concern about academic integrity and plagiarism using AI. This is a real risk. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - AI can make errors and inappropriate suggestions. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - This is a known issue with AI systems reflecting training data biases. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - There are legitimate concerns about data privacy when using AI systems. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches - AI may not always suggest pedagogically sound approaches. I would say "Agree"


Now I need to format these responses according to the required structure.
